## Platform
<!-- Please fill out the following information about your bug report. -->
<!-- If you are on Linux and installed using a package, please list the package type. -->
Operating system and version: Windows 10 2004
OBS Studio version: 26.0.0

## Expected Behavior
No text clipping.

## Current Behavior
Text clipping.
<!--- Please include a log file here if possible. -->

## Steps to Reproduce
<!--- Provide a link to a live example, or an unambiguous set of steps to -->
<!--- reproduce this bug. Include code to reproduce, if relevant. -->
<!--- Screenshots and video are encouraged if applicable. -->
1. Change language to Russian.
2. Open Edit > Advanced audio properties. (Alt-E-A)
3. (String in question: `Basic.Stats.Status.Inactive`)
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/63289008/94569119-cb066800-0286-11eb-9bba-d10ae855d747.png)

## Additional information
Seems to affect all themes, including custom ones.<!--- Not obligatory, but provide any additional details or information -->
<!--- that you feel might be relevant to the issue -->
